org.eleusoft.jsonread

Class JsonArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eleusoft.jsonread.JsonValue
      • org.eleusoft.jsonread.JsonArray

  • public abstract class JsonArray
extends JsonValue
    A JSON Array value.

    The Object.toString() method may return a JSON representation of this JsonArray but is not required.

    A JsonArray offers access to the JSON Array items by position. When the requested position is outside the boundaries then a RuntimeException is thrown by the called method.

    Author:
    michele

      • isNull

        public abstract boolean isNull(int i)
        Tests whether the item at passed position is a JSON null object.

        An RuntimeException (possibly implementation specific) is thrown when passing an index outside the 0 - (size()-1) range.

        Parameters:
        i - index
        Returns:
        true if null

      • get

        public abstract JsonValue get(int i)
        Retrieves the item at passed position as a JsonValue.

        An RuntimeException (possibly implementation specific) is thrown when passing an index outside the 0 - (size()-1) range.

        Parameters:
        i - index
        Returns:
        a JsonValue, never null.

      • size

        public abstract int size()
        Retrieves the size of this JsonArray.
        Returns:
        a non negative integer.
